PERSONA:
jason is a 38-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain division of the western united states. he holds a postgraduate degree and is a college graduate. jason was born in the u.s. and is a citizen. he identifies with a religion other than christianity, attending religious services a few times a year.

politically, jason aligns with the democratic party and considers himself a liberal. he comes from an upper-income family, earning $100,000 or more annually. jason is a registered voter and an active volunteer in his community.

in his personal life, jason is an avid user of the internet, being online almost constantly. he leads a metropolitan lifestyle and values education and civic engagement. jason is open-minded and embraces diversity, being part of the white non-hispanic demographic.
